title: How can we live with philosophy? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s really simple , philosophy of which the literal translation is Philo = love Sophia = wisdom / knowledge So how do you live wisely ? How do you live a reasoned life ? Are your thoughts and imaginings running your life ? Is your life measured under a form of disciple and balance ? Are you using reason and rational to make life choices ? Or conversely is discursive mind running your life , with all the irrational fear of the future / anxiety or overthinking the past / depression ? This could be considered living with Philosophy …  Those that don’t understand the practical aspects of philosophical thinking are merely navel- gazing .
